resources.string: Our team is aiming to develop Catch your Meal, a mobile application that will enable students to create customisable meal plans and have them delivered to their doorsteps. Ethnic food will be prepared in a dedicated kitchen, and delivered to the studentsâ€™ residences. Students will be able to create lunch and dinner meal plans by selecting dishes from a wide range of South Asian dishes. Student will be able to select delivery dates and times and change them within a reasonable time before delivery.
